title: This Steak Sauce Recipe Is Magic on Leaner Cuts
sub_head: Make a luxurious meal of flank, hanger or skirt steak with a chunky caper-walnut sauce and a side of roasted beets
body:
FOR A LEAN CUT of beef like flank, hanger or skirt steak, chef Tomos Parry favors this chunky, savory sauce. A combination of toasted walnuts, charred spring onions and radishes, chopped gherkins and capers, parsley and thyme, the sauce balances the beef with a bit of bite and lots of flavor.
In Mr. Parryâ€™s second Slow Food Fast recipe, he serves a side of roasted beets with the steak and the sauce, his own invention, taking cues from the walnut-based sauces of Italy and Argentine chimichurri.
